about_the_game:
It’s not clear which parallel timeline this Karl has stepped out of, grizzled and bloodstained. Perhaps this is merely everyday fashion where he’s from, but it might be a sign of a bleak future, where the Dead War still rages. He might be here to help out, or to prevent some sort of catastrophe in his version of history – or maybe to escape from something far worse…
This pack includes:
- Future Karl Outfit
- 2 Hats for Karl (Robot Eye + Ballistic Helmet)
